titleStmt.title: A dialogue between Lod. Muggleton and the Quakers: Shewing forth the damnable blasphemies of that impudent impostor, collected out of their own printed letters. To undeceive the people. ...
titleStmt.author: Muggleton, Lodowick, 1609-1698.
